Title: Requires publications to identify when the use of artificial intelligence is present within such publication
Summary: Requires that every newspaper, magazine or other publication printed or electronically published in this state, which contains the use of generative artificial intelligence or other information communication technology, shall identify that certain parts of such newspaper, magazine, or publication were composed through the use of artificial intelligence or other information communication technology.
LawCode: Add ยง338, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring publications to identify when the use of artificial intelligence is present within such publication
